column1: Kyowa Kirin sponsored the 30th Australian and New Zealand Bone and Mineral Society Annual Scientific Meeting (ANZBMS).  12 - 14  October, 2020. This event was organised by ASN Events and Kyowa Kirin was not responsible for inviting the attendees or organising the educational content, the hospitality, accommodation or travel.  3 days - 19 hours 25 mins educational content
column3: Clinicians, scientists in musculoskeletal field, Endocrinologists, Orthopaedic researchers, registrars
